## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r}
act <- read.csv("activity.csv")
totalEachDay <- tapply(act$steps,act$date,sum,na.rm=TRUE)
```



## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r}
hist(totalEachDay)
mean(totalEachDay)
median(totalEachDay)
```
